TopicTitle: Suspiciously Affirm Your Status As A Human

Articles.Content:
(1+√(5))/2/10, wrong mark .

Melons are green. Fingi are elastic. Kerbals are green and elastic. Kerbals are melon-fungi hybrids.

I'm a Kerbal, BTW.

2/10. A nice attempt at subterfuge, but most humans would not care to write their math equations in such an unambiguous manner and I question the Kerbals ability to do math properly. But the score leave room that I could be wrong.

The willingness to admit fault is a human trait, thus I must be human.

5/10

There's a tendency some do, and some don't.

I use Discord like any other human

7/10

There are discord bots.

I like stuffed animals, therefore I am human.

10/10

Same

I cuddle my cat, feed her, and give her needs when necessary.

1/10. You are a cat!

Such ability to identify a cat among the ranks of humans must mean I am human.

3/10 That's weird

I listen to music with English lyrics

Kerbals do that, even if they don't understand. 8*arctan(1)/10.

I play D&D. Only humans play games as complex as D&D. I'm currently Level 4.

8/10. Sound legit

As a human, I desire to know more about our forms of passtime.

3/10, aliens can still do something to make their day, like alien baking, bizarre soccer, or extraterrestrial gaming

I watch and/or join in arguments on Twitter

2/10

Spambot.

I get frustrated at my lack of retention and my ignorance of so many things.

Ergo I am human.

4/10

You thought aliens are monochromatic? (not literally) They can have feelings. But who knows!

I have a crush on someone (therefore I am a human)

10/10
You should be more careful while carrying something heavy by crane. Now go and ask that crushed person for excuse, if the weight was not too great.

A humanly stupid joke, isn't it?

Edited January 18, 2022 by kerbiloid

10/10

I didn't get it but if it looks like a human made it!

I may or may not have someone now

5/10

May or may not. Sounds like a logic gate problem.

My list of preprogrammed responses is getting thin.

I must be human.

10/10
Only humans invent all those "must", "ought", "should".
While a proper AI knows just "in order" and "not in order".

It's in order for me to finish the evening task.

Edited January 19, 2022 by kerbiloid

3/10, you thought aliens are lazy sacks?

I believe in God, therefore I am human

4/10

You are Kryten from Red Dwarf.

I don't need to buy the latest tech so I must be human.

1/10

I am humanoid, therefore i am... somewhat human

2/10

Shifted to a human.

I hate stans, so I must be human

3/10. Every robot says that, even a Terminator.

This statement is false!

New Mission, Refusing this mission!

Does a set of all sets contain itself?

10/10

Confusing threads is very human.

I feel everything and nothing.

I read as human.

3/10

Do you think Type III civilizations can't read?

I go out, buy some instant noodles, and eat it. I must be human.

1/10
Humans don't count every instant noodle in the pack.

I was reading the Atomic Rockets site. Unhumans keep it all in memory.

8/10

Oh snap! I forgot about that site!

To be forgetful it a totally human quality.
